籚字的基本解释

籚
lú
古书上说的一种竹子。
矛、戟的柄。
筐；饭器。
古同“櫨”。

籚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lú］
［《廣韻》落胡切，平模，來。］
“廬3”的被通假字。
(1)矛戟的柄。
(2)饭器，其形如筐。
(3)竹名。

籚字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　籚； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页904第29
【廣韻】落胡切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】龍都切，?音盧。【廣韻】籚西竹，出會稽。【戴凱之·竹譜】有竹象籚，因以爲名。東甌諸郡，緣海所生。肌理勻淨，筠色潤貞。凡今之篪，匪兹不鳴。　又【類篇】筐也。大曰籚，小曰籃。【儀禮·士昏禮註】笲竹器而衣者，其形蓋如今之筥?籚矣。　又通作廬。【周禮·冬官考工記】秦無廬。【註】矛戟柄也。　又【韻會】同櫨。柱上拊也。【晉語】侏儒扶籚。

籚字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
籚字的起名意思

古书上说的一种竹子。矛、戟的柄。

basket made of rush
Basic explanation of words
basket made of rush
lú
A kind of bamboo mentioned in ancient books.
The handles of spears and halberds.
Basket; rice utensils.
The ancient same as "Pan".
basket made of rush
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lú]
["Guangyun" Luo Huqie, flat model, come. ]
"Lu 3" was passed falsely.
(1) The handle of a spear.
(2) Rice utensils, which are shaped like baskets.
(3) Bamboo name.
basket made of rush
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not on Collection] [Bamboo Character Department] 　籚; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 904 29
[Guang Yun] Luo Hu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Long Du Qi,? Yin Lu. [Guangyun] Lai Xizhu, leaving Kuaiji. 【Dai Kaizhi·Bamboo Spectrum】There are bamboo elephants, because they are famous. All counties in East Ou were born in Yuanhai. The texture is even and clean, and the color is smooth and pure. The bandit does not scream for the chichi of today.　[Classes] Basket also. The big one is Lai, the small one is the basket. 【Ritual·Shifu Li Note】The shape and cover of those who wear bamboo wares and cloths are what they are now? 籚矣.　Tong Zuolu again. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] Qin Wulu. [Note] The handle of the spear and the halberd.　[Yunhui] Same as Zhi. Stretching on the column also. [Jin dialect] The dwarf supports Lai.
basket made of rush
